Title: Azure SQL triggers for Azure Functions
Description: This post is about Azure SQL trigger for Azure Functions. The Azure SQL trigger uses SQL change tracking functionality to monitor a SQL table for changes and trigger a function when a row is created, updated, or deleted. Changes are processed in the order that their changes were made, with the oldest changes being processed first. Currently SQL trigger is not available as part of Visual Studio new function screen. We need to create an Azure function and modify code to support Sql triggers.
